_source.short_desc: The #1 patient success platform for self-scheduling. Trusted by 100k+ providers.
_source.long_desc: #1 Appointment Scheduler for hospitals, specialties, & PCPs. Self-scheduling capabilities, cancellation/reschedule management, and referral management. HIPAA-compliant and customizable to any schedule, flexible with multiple locations/appt types/providers. Trusted by 100,000+ happy providers. Easy integration into 70+ EHR/PMs.
_source.target_audience: Luma Health serves mid-size clinics, community health centers, and enterprise health systems around patient access and engagement, with a suite of solutions to help you in healthcare new normal.

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar & take busywork off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations to you and your clients, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments or accept donations. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your schedule, get booked 24/7, send automated reminders, manage memberships, securely process payments & more. Starts at $25/mo
related_products.features: Boost your productivity and free up time with Vagaro Salon, Spa & Fitness Appointment Scheduling Software. Schedule appointments from a desktop or use our App to manage clients on the go. Get booked on our marketplace, your booking page, Facebook, Yelp, Instagram or on your own website via our booking widget. Send automated reminders and emails. Securely process payments. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Housecall Pro is a top-rated business solution for home service professionals to streamline scheduling, dispatching, payments, & more.
related_products.features:
Call now to get up to 80% off your first month: 855-921-4757.

Easily Schedule Jobs, Assign Team Members, and Set Arrival Windows in only a few clicks. Housecall Pro is an all-in-one Field Service management app that helps automate business processes and workflows. Trusted by over 25,000 home service companies.

related_products.short_desc: SimplePractice is the #1 HIPAA compliant practice management software. Join 100000+ thriving health & wellness professionals.
related_products.features:
The all-in-one practice management solution for private practitioners. Practitioners who switched to SimplePractice spent 35% less time on scheduling each week. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. Send paperless intakes and insurance forms.  Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. 
Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest.
Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify appointment scheduling and automate reminders with Mindbody scheduling software and streamline business management.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks, like scheduling meetings, quick and easy.
related_products.features: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks like scheduling and organizing meetings fast and easy. The worlds leader in online scheduling, doodle.com is used by over 30 million people each month. Doodle AG is headquartered in Zurich.

related_products.short_desc: Fresha is world's leading appointment booking software and is totally subscription-free!
related_products.features: Fresha is the world's leading booking software for appointment scheduling and is totally subscription-free! Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your business. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing, deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to manage and grow your brand from a fully-integrated singular platform. You can?t be great without integrate!
related_products.features: Enjoy the fruits of a busy schedule . When it comes to business, time is money. Scheduling allows you to maximize your time and revenue by giving you full control over your schedule, staff, services and more. Create your free account today to learn more and explore plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers the most extensive online booking system on the market, one that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a full blown booking website, or a widget for your own website, where you can present your business and accept appointments, sell products, membership, packs, gift cards and service add-ons. Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments (POS).

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, the software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you can focus on what matters most to you.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on what matters most to you. similar_products.short_desc: Square Appointments is an all-in-one scheduling POS for booking, payments, and team management.
similar_products.features: Running a business is hard enough, especially if you're juggling multiple tools to do different things. It's a one-stop-shop solution that helps you save time and stay organized because it's customized for businesses who run on appointments. Square Appointments is now free for individuals, and really affordable for teams.

similar_products.features: Give time back to your customers and staff with Waitwhile's simple and flexible appointment scheduling solution. Centrally manage calendars and automate custom appointment reminders through email and/or SMS to reduce no-show rates.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.

_source.short_desc: Maintain capacity & deliver care with seamless HIPAA-compliant virtual visits that require NO app, logins, or portals for patients.
_source.long_desc: We're the #1 provider choice for HIPAA-compliant Telemedicine. Our telehealth and patient communication platform is trusted by 100,000+ healthcare professionals. No app, no downloads, no logins, no portals, no account set up for patients. Pre-screen patients for virtual visits and triage communication. Maximize your reimbursements and capacity. Optimized reminder cadences maximizes patient attendance and outcomes.
_source.target_audience: Luma Health serves mid-size clinics, community health centers, and enterprise health systems around patient access and engagement, with a suite of solutions to help you in healthcare new normal.

related_products.short_desc: Lead stress-free, reliable video appointments with SimplePractice's fully integrated, HIPAA-compliant Telehealth platform.
related_products.features: Telehealth by SimplePractice is a fully integrated video appointment solution that's 100% HIPAA-compliant. You can start your telehealth session from anywhere-no extra logins or hassle for you or your clients. Send paperless intake forms, resources, and other documents directly from the Client Portal. You can also simplify your billing with AutoPay. From start to finish, SimplePractice makes client care easier than ever.

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.

Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based telemedicine ready EHR with HIPAA compliant video conferencing, virtual waiting room, and online scheduling.
related_products.features: DrChrono EHR can now be used to provide patients with clinical help in the comfort of their own homes. Online scheduling and HIPAA compliant video conferencing gives our doctors telemedicine capabilities, reducing wait time in the clinic and improving patient experience for those whom it may not be so convenient to get to an urgent care center.

related_products.short_desc: Launch your integrated Telemedicine program today with Mend. Best for 11+ Provider Groups.
related_products.features:
Launch your integrated Telemedicine program today with Mend. 

Best for 11+ Provider Groups, Mend is a healthcare communications platform. Mend can connect to patients anytime, anywhere, and with any device through messaging, video, or forms. Mend is the absolute easiest, fully integrated technology to engage your patients. Get Patient Engagement, Intake Forms, Scheduling, and Appointment Reminders all in one easy to use integrated platform to make your Telehealth a success from the start.

related_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based, telehealth-friendly EHR system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience and streamlines workflows.
related_products.features: RXNT's telemedicine-friendly Electronic Health Records (EHR) system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience from anywhere. Manage communication with secure two-way patient messaging, and electronic reminders keep patients informed about appointments and prescription renewals. Patients benefit from a dedicated patient portal that lets them manage information, schedule appointments, view lab results, and sign consent forms. Plus, seamlessly bill for your telehealth services.

related_products.short_desc: eClinicalWorks is a leader in healthcare IT, providing innovative, customizable Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management.
related_products.features: eClinicalWorks is a privately held leader in healthcare IT, providing comprehensive Electronic Health Record (EHR) and Practice Management (PM) solutions used by more than 850,000 providers in more than 20 countries.

related_products.short_desc: Electronic health records and Telemedicine software designed for medical offices of all specialties and sizes.
related_products.features: PrognoCIS EHR & Telehealth is a fully-integrated, specialty-specific EHR, practice management and billing suite. Ranked as a Top 10 Cloud-Based EHR by KLAS. Features include: Integrated Telehealth, patient portal, customizable specialty-specific templates, e-prescribing, Meaningful Use dashboard, medical billing software, and more. Both web-based or client/server versions are available. CCHIT and ONC-ATCB certified to help practitioners meet Meaningful Use requirements.

We integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience. similar_products.features: Expand your practice revenue by having doctor-to-patient live video calls for quick and easy patient care. talkEHR Telehealth is designed to connect physicians directly with patients in a way that makes care convenient and accessible. Built on our secure cloud-based network, talkEHR Telehealth creates a seamless experience across all mobile and desktop devices. Providing care through Telehealth has never been this easy. The MTBC EHR is MIPS and MACRA certified, so you are in compliance!

similar_products.short_desc: Lead stress-free, reliable video appointments with SimplePractice's fully integrated, HIPAA-compliant Telehealth platform.
similar_products.features: Telehealth by SimplePractice is a fully integrated video appointment solution that's 100% HIPAA-compliant. You can start your telehealth session from anywhere-no extra logins or hassle for you or your clients. Send paperless intake forms, resources, and other documents directly from the Client Portal. You can also simplify your billing with AutoPay. From start to finish, SimplePractice makes client care easier than ever.

similar_products.short_desc: PatientPop is an all-in-one, HIPAA-compliant solution built specifically for doctors to deliver best-in-class virtual care.
similar_products.features: PatientPop empowers you to manage the most important aspects of your practice from the cloud so you can treat your patients virtually. Your patients can continue to receive the quality care they need from the safety and convenience of their own homes. We integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best modern experience. Some features include: 2-way HD video, unique video link, virtual waiting room, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Cliniko is a practice management tool that's loved and trusted by more than 65,000 health professionals around the world.
similar_products.features:
Cliniko is complete practice management software with secure telehealth that's used by over 65k healthcare practitioners in more than 95 countries worldwide. Cliniko also includes online booking, online payments, treatment notes, patient communications, and much more. All data transmitted between you and Cliniko is encrypted and Cliniko meets or exceeds all regulations of the Australian Privacy Principles, GDPR, PIPEDA, and HIPAA.

Sign up to try Cliniko free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based, telehealth-friendly EHR system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience and streamlines workflows.
similar_products.features: RXNT's telemedicine-friendly Electronic Health Records (EHR) system with Patient Portal optimizes the patient care experience from anywhere. Manage communication with secure two-way patient messaging, and electronic reminders keep patients informed about appointments and prescription renewals. Patients benefit from a dedicated patient portal that lets them manage information, schedule appointments, view lab results, and sign consent forms. Plus, seamlessly bill for your telehealth services.

similar_products.short_desc: Curogram is a cloud-based HIPAA compliant patient engagement platform that integrates with all EMR/EHR systems.
similar_products.features:
Curogram is a cloud-based HIPAA-compliant patient engagement platform that integrates with all EMR/EHR systems. 

Curogram provides a complete patient engagement experience for a fraction of the cost of a postage stamp. The platform includes: easy-to-use secure two-way texting, electronic patient forms, smart appointment booking and reminders, mass texting, automated survey and rating requests, online payments  and multi-user telemedicine.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Home Health Care tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Home Health Care software aids with billing, financial, clinical, scheduling, medical record, and point of care aspects of home health care. This type of software also offers medical notes, billing, insurance claims, inventory, and medication management tools. Home Health Care software is related to Long Term Care software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software, Electronic Medical Records software, and Medical Practice Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Mental Health software handles activities such as patient record keeping, billing, and scheduling for mental health facilities. Typically, Mental Health applications offer a variety of flexible features, which assist in the management and organization of patient records, progress notes, billing and invoicing, and staff and appointment scheduling. Mental health clinics use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including patient reporting generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Mental Health software is related to Human Services software, Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.
